item.title: 3D puzzle print: a crossword generation tool
item.description:
A tool to design 3D printed crossword puzzles.

Generating 3D crossword models

I’ve been working on a tool to generate crossword designs using OpenSCAD. The output is an STL file that you can use with your favourite slicer and send to a 3D printer. It’s open source, and you’re free to plunder it for tips, techniques, or to generate your own…

item.title: Text adventures in 3D
item.description:
This is a necropost, resurrected from an old blog.

Educational games

It’s time to take a look at a project from almost a decade ago! Source code, screenshots, documentation and (old!) binaries are now available in the instantiator/openbook-v2 GitHub repository.
